name: test_e2e_with_logs[136_GQL_DATA_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_DATA_001` |
| **Name** | GraphQL mass data extraction |
| **Category** | GRAPHQL |
| **Subcategory** | data_extraction |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{users(first:999999){id,email,password}}`
- **Encoded**: `%7Busers(first%3A999999)%7Bid%2Cemail%2Cpassword%7D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Latency**: ~1000ms
